hadiths.text: Abu Huraira (Allah be pleased with him) said he heard Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:Swearing produces a ready sale for a commodity, but blots out the blessing

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ الْحَلِفِ، فِي الْبَيْعِ
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of swearing oaths when selling
